collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (7 total Queries, 3 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `sertifikat`.*, `projects`.`name` as `project_name`, `users`.`name` as `contractor_name`, ( CASE WHEN ((SELECT `status_pemeriksaan` FROM `pemeriksaan` WHERE `jenis_file` = 'file_kuantitas' AND `sertifikat_id` = `sertifikat`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal_pemeriksaan` DESC LIMIT 1) = 'ditolak' OR (SELECT `status_pemeriksaan` FROM `pemeriksaan` WHERE `jenis_file` = 'file_kualitas' AND `sertifikat_id` = `sertifikat`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal_pemeriksaan` DESC LIMIT 1) = 'ditolak') THEN 'rejected' WHEN ((SELECT `status_pemeriksaan` FROM `pemeriksaan` WHERE `jenis_file` = 'file_kuantitas' AND `sertifikat_id` = `sertifikat`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal_pemeriksaan` DESC LIMIT 1) = 'disetujui' AND (SELECT `status_pemeriksaan` FROM `pemeriksaan` WHERE `jenis_file` = 'file_kualitas' AND `sertifikat_id` = `sertifikat`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal_pemeriksaan` DESC LIMIT 1) = 'disetujui') THEN 'approved' ELSE 'pending' END ) as status FROM `sertifikat` JOIN `projects` ON `sertifikat`.`project_id` = `projects`.`id` JOIN `users` ON `projects`.`kontraktor_id` = `users`.`id`

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `sertifikat`.*, `projects`.`name` as `project_name`, `users`.`name` as `contractor_name`, ( CASE WHEN ((SELECT `status_pemeriksaan` FROM `pemeriksaan` WHERE `jenis_file` = 'file_kuantitas' AND `sertifikat_id` = `sertifikat`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal_pemeriksaan` DESC LIMIT 1) = 'ditolak' OR (SELECT `status_pemeriksaan` FROM `pemeriksaan` WHERE `jenis_file` = 'file_kualitas' AND `sertifikat_id` = `sertifikat`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal_pemeriksaan` DESC LIMIT 1) = 'ditolak') THEN 'rejected' WHEN ((SELECT `status_pemeriksaan` FROM `pemeriksaan` WHERE `jenis_file` = 'file_kuantitas' AND `sertifikat_id` = `sertifikat`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal_pemeriksaan` DESC LIMIT 1) = 'disetujui' AND (SELECT `status_pemeriksaan` FROM `pemeriksaan` WHERE `jenis_file` = 'file_kualitas' AND `sertifikat_id` = `sertifikat`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal_pemeriksaan` DESC LIMIT 1) = 'disetujui') THEN 'approved' ELSE 'pending' END ) as status FROM `sertifikat` JOIN `projects` ON `sertifikat`.`project_id` = `projects`.`id` JOIN `users` ON `projects`.`kontraktor_id` = `users`.`id`
